product_page_short_description: 80 PLUS Gold Certified, Main Japanese Capacitors
full_description:
Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply

The Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply provides dependable and efficient power delivery to your PC setup. It guarantees great efficiency, minimizes wasted energy, and lowers power bills thanks to its 80 PLUS Gold accreditation. It promises longevity and silent operation even under severe loads thanks to its 120mm Silent Hydraulic Bearing (HYB) Fan and primary Japanese capacitors. Stable power distribution is ensured by the single +12V rail, and your components are protected from harm by comprehensive protection that includes OVP, OPP, SCP, UVP, OCP, and OTP. With an Intel Form Factor ATX 12V type, the Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply smoothly integrates into your system and is appropriate for a variety of PC cases due to its compact form. With an input voltage range of 100–240 Vac to allow worldwide usage, active PFC guarantees effective power conversion. For demanding settings, the 650W output capacity offers enough power. Longevity is increased by the fan's hydraulic bearing design, and its 80 PLUS Gold efficiency rating guarantees peak performance at typical loads. This Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply provides long-term durability with a mean time between failures (MTBF) of over 100,000 hours. In addition to a variety of connectors that accommodate different component configurations, such as ATX/MB 20+4 Pin, CPU/EPS 4+4 Pin, PCI-e 6+2 Pin, SATA, and 4 Pin Peripheral, the accompanying flat, all-black cables guarantee neat cable management.

High-Quality Japanese Capacitors

The Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply uses high-quality Japanese capacitors, resulting in a steady and long-lasting power supply. Our protection features, which include OCP, OTP, OVP, OPP, UVP, and SCP, ensure the reliable operation of the entire computer system in any situation. To further guarantee the reliable and safe operation of your system, we have acquired safety certifications from a number of international organizations.

120mm Hydraulic Bearing (HYB) Fan

With its 120mm fan, the Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply intelligently adjusts its rotational speed to reduce noise based on temperature and current power use. Comparing the Hydraulic Bearing fan to the standard Sleeve fan, the former has a shorter lifespan and less stability.

80 PLUS Gold Certified

With a 90% efficiency rate at a 50% load guaranteed by the 80 Plus Gold certification, there is less power waste, less heat production, and less noise from the fans. Hardware compatibility, stability, and maximum power output are provided by the single +12V rail. The architecture of this Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply makes it the best option for overclocking while also making power cord installation simpler.

Compact Design

The Gigabyte GP-P650G 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply Unit's dimensions have been successfully lowered thanks to GIGABYTE's outstanding design skills and the use of premium components. This small power supply not only makes installation into different chassis easier, but it also improves the case's thermal efficiency.

full_description:
Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 1300w 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply

The Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply is a premium solution designed to fulfill the needs of high-performance computer systems. With a power output capacity of 1300W, this PSU provides plenty of power for even the most power-hungry components, assuring steady and dependable performance under high loads. Despite its high power output, the UD1300GM PG5 has a small form that helps you save room in your PC case, making it appropriate for a variety of PC configurations, including compact and full-size systems. This power supply is 80 PLUS Gold certified and provides great energy efficiency, decreasing wasted energy and running expenses while limiting heat generation. The use of major Japanese capacitors assures exceptional reliability and durability, resulting in continuous power delivery and life for your system components. The UD1300GM PG5 features a 140mm double ball bearing fan for excellent cooling and silent operation, maintaining appropriate temperatures even during strenuous gaming sessions or CPU-intensive workloads. This fan design not only improves cooling performance, but it also increases the power supply's lifetime and dependability. The Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 includes a wide range of protective features, such as Over Voltage protective (OVP), Over Power Protection (OPP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), Under Voltage Protection (UVP), Over Current Protection (OCP), and Over Temperature Protection (OTP). These protections assist to protect your system components from harm caused by voltage fluctuations, power surges, or other possible threats, assuring your PC hardware's safety and lifespan.

High-Quality Japanese Capacitors

The Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 The 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply employs high-quality Japanese capacitors, resulting in a reliable and long-lasting power supply. Our protection measures, which include OCP, OTP, OVP, OPP, UVP, and SCP, ensure that the complete computer system functions properly in any circumstance. To ensure that your system operates reliably and safely, we have obtained safety certifications from a variety of international organizations.

140mm Double Ball Bearing Fan

The Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply uses a 140mm fan that regulates its rotational speed to decrease noise based on temperature and power usage. The Double Ball Bearing fan has a shorter lifetime and less stability than the typical Sleeve fan.

80 PLUS Gold Certified

The 80 Plus Gold accreditation guarantees a 90% efficiency rate at 50% load, which results in less power waste, heat output, and fan noise. The single +12V rail provides hardware compatibility, reliability, and the highest possible power output. The architecture of the Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 The 650W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply is the finest solution for overclocking and simplifies power cable installation.

Compact Design

Gigabyte UD1300GM PG5 The dimensions of the 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX Power Supply Unit have been effectively reduced owing to GIGABYTE's exceptional design talents and the use of high-quality components. This tiny power supply not only facilitates installation into various chassis, but it also increases the case's thermal efficiency.

product_page_short_description: Type: Intel Form Factor ATX 12V v2.31
Fan Size: 140mm Double ball bearing Fan
full_description:
GIGABYTE AORUS P1200W 80+ Platinum Modular Power Supply

The GIGABYTE AORUS P1200W is a high-performance power supply unit (PSU) that is designed to meet the demands of demanding gaming PCs and workstations. It is rated at 80+ Platinum efficiency, which means that it can deliver up to 92% energy efficiency at 50% load, reducing energy waste and lowering operating costs. One of the key features of this PSU is its modular design, which allows users to only connect the cables they need, reducing cable clutter and improving airflow within the computer case. This design also makes it easy to replace or upgrade cables in the future.

Digital LCD Monitor

The Digital LCD Monitor can not only display the health status of the power supply in real-time but also display various texts, pictures, GIFs, and MP4. You can also adjust the lighting effect through RGB FUSION 2.0 software.

RGB Fusion 2.0

This GIGABYTE AORUS P1200W Power Supply features RGB Fusion 2.0. This software program allows users to customize the lighting effects of their AORUS devices. It features 16.7 million customizable color options, as well as a variety of different lighting effects, such as flash, pulse, and fade. Users can also synchronize their lighting effects with other AORUS devices, creating a cohesive and coordinated lighting setup. The software is user-friendly and easy to navigate, allowing for quick and easy customization of your device's lighting. Additionally, the software supports a wide range of AORUS devices such as motherboards, graphics cards, keyboards, and mice. RGB Fusion 2.0 allows users to create a unique and personalized lighting experience for their PC.

Fully Modular Design

The GIGABYTE AORUS P1200W Power Supply is fully modular. All of the black flat cables are designed to be modular. Installing only the cords you need reduces clutter, increases airflow, and improves the thermal performance of the chassis.
